title: Tom Brady's future, Luka Doncic/Zion Williamson, Jimmy Garoppolo
itunes:title: Tom Brady's future, Luka Doncic/Zion Williamson, Jimmy Garoppolo
description:
Colin discusses the latest on where Tom Brady may end up, why he feels Luka Dončić is great but Zion Williamson is a phenom, why the Niners have issues with Jimmy Garoppolo, and why only certain people should be the face of a franchise. Guests include Doug Gottlieb, Greg Cosell, BJ Armstrong, Brady Poppinga and Jason McIntyre.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
